description: Performance metrics with generation statistics and campaign insights

requirements.description: The system shall provide an analytics dashboard displaying key image generation metrics including: total images generated per campaign, average generation time, success/failure rates, and resource utilization stats. Data must be filterable by date range, campaign, and brand.
requirements.title: Analytics Dashboard Core Metrics

validation.notes: Dashboard loads and displays real production data
Dashboard loads in < 2 seconds with 6 months of data
Stakeholders can track campaign performance effectively

title: Analytics dashboard
